name: Pong Fight
description:
My first common lisp program. I pretend to keep working on it to add more features, skills, better sprites (I'm not a good artist, but I'm trying, =P). 

I'll take your suggestion and critics for the better, and hopefully we can improve it together.

Many thanks to @borodust, for making this wonderful library (trivial-gamekit) for CL. He is very considerate and helped me a lot through the jam. 

And all the #lispgames community on freenode and the Lisp server on discord, thank you all!

And I also have to thank my mom, who made me coffee every day and night.

Source code and instructions for compiling the program: https://github.com/eliasfeijo/cl-pong-game
